mapper.select: select od.seq as seq, mp.name as productName, mp.image as productImage, mp.brand as productBrand, od.option_name as optionName ,to_char(o.reg_dt, 'yyyy-MM-dd') as regDt from order_details_tbl2 od, order_tbl2 o, men_product_tbl2 mp where od.order_seq = o.seq and od.product_seq = mp.seq and o.user_id = #{userId} and od.order_status = '주문완료' order by regdt desc
select count(*) from review_tbl2 where order_details_seq = #{seq}

select od.seq as seq, m.image as productImage , m.name as productName , m.brand as productBrand , od.option_name as optionName from order_details_tbl2 od, men_product_tbl2 m where od.seq = #{seq} and m.seq = od.product_seq
mapper.insert: merge into review_tbl2 using dual on (user_id = #{userId} and order_details_seq = #{orderDetailsSeq}) when matched then update set content = #{content}, mod_dt = sysDate , score = #{score} when not matched then insert(seq, user_id, content, score, reg_dt, mod_dt, del_yn, order_details_seq) values(review_sequence.nextval, #{userId}, #{content} , #{score}, sysDate, null, 'n', #{orderDetailsSeq})
